name: The Whispered World Special Edition
descr: 关于此游戏When the fate of a world hangs in the balance, an unusual hero arises!The visually impressive adventure-epic The Whispered World  is now available as a Special Edition for the first time.  Let the Whispered World enchant you with its many animated details and fantastic characters.Sadwick's adventure begins when he sets out to understand the meaning of his recurring nightmares. In his dreams, he is haunted by a mysterious blue sphere as his world collapses around him.Shana, the oracle, confirms his worst fears: not only does she foretell the end of the world, but also that Sadwick is the very reason for their doom.Face the prophecy and experience an adventure unlike any other!Exclusive content of the special edition include audio comments featuring Jan 'Poki'  Müller-Michaelis and Marco Hüllen, as well as the orchestral soundtrack and unlockable achievements.Key FeaturesSolve mysterious and fascinating puzzlesMeet many wondrous characters in an intriguing world.Exclusive audio comment featuring 'Poki' and Marco Hüllen, the game's writersAn unforgettable story
detail:
名称: The Whispered World Special Edition
类型: 冒险, 独立
开发者: Daedalic Entertainment
发行商: Daedalic Entertainment
发行日期: 2014 年 5 月 6 日
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
操作系统 *: Windows Vista/7
处理器: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB RAM,  Shader Model 2.0 Support (Shared Memory is not recommended)
DirectX 版本: 9.0c
存储空间: 需要 1800 MB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX 9.0c compatible
推荐配置:
操作系统 *: Windows Vista/7/8-32bit
处理器: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
内存: 2 GB RAM
显卡: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM,  Shader Model 2.0 Support (Shared Memory is not recommended)
DirectX 版本: 9.0c
存储空间: 需要 1800 MB 可用空间
声卡: DirectX 9.0c compatible
*
2024 年 1 月 1 日（PT）起，Steam 客户端将仅支持 Windows 10 及更新版本。

Mac OS X
最低配置:
操作系统: Mac OSX 10.7
处理器: 2 GHz (Dual Core) Intel
内存: 1 GB RAM
显卡: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 256 MB RAM,  Shader Model 2.0 Support (Shared Memory is not recommended)
存储空间: 需要 1800 MB 可用空间
声卡: 16 bit
推荐配置:
操作系统: Mac OSX 10.11
处理器: Intel 2.7 GHz Dual Core CPU
内存: 2 MB RAM
显卡: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1024 MB RAM,  Shader Model 2.0 Support
存储空间: 需要 1800 MB 可用空间
声卡: 16 bit

SteamOS + Linux
最低配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 12.04 (64 Bit only)
处理器: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU
内存: 2 MB RAM
显卡: Geforce 9400 Series, ATI Radeon HD 4500 Series with at least 256 MB VRAM and proprietary drivers, latest OpenGL driver
存储空间: 需要 1800 MB 可用空间
声卡: Sound Card with latest drivers
推荐配置:
操作系统: Ubuntu 14.04 (64 Bit only)
处理器: 2.6 GHz Dual Core CPU
内存: 4 MB RAM
显卡: ATI Radeon HD 5600 Series, Geforce 9400 GT or better with proprietary drivers
存储空间: 需要 1800 MB 可用空间
声卡: Sound Card with latest drivers
